main.name: Ofego Edafe
main.description: with hands-on experience in all levels of testing, including performance, functional, integration, system, and user acceptance
main.bio: Since beginning my journey as a freelance designer nearly 4 years ago, I've done remote work for agencies, consulted for startups, and collaborated with talented people to create digital products for both business and consumer use. I'm quietly confident, naturally curious, and constantly working on improving my skills one design problem at a time.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

resume.skillmessage: Anyone can fix problems or come about with Contemporary solutions , with my years of experience undergoing my current bachelors degree in software engineering, i have been pushed beyond this. The idea is not simply to build a solution... but designing the best solution that is a reliable end result. with as low maintainance as neccessary and no complexity.

work.title: software Developer
work.description: Lead Software Developer at Triple Height School, a new and upcoming Junior and Senior High school located in Lagos Nigeria. Responsible in the individual development of a backend Java web application to assist the registerer of the college keep record and update records of all the student's paid and unpaid fees. This was achieved using REST API Technology

work.title: Junior Software Engineer
work.description: Developed AWG, a script that speeds up the development process of the harnessing team because it allows for the creation of WIDs, BIDs and XML from CSVs.

testimonials.text: Thank you so much for your contribution to my project, without your efforts i surely wouldnt have arrived at a precise solution.

Ofego Edafe must be one of the most brilliant pupils I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may still be completing his degree and have a little on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
